website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive yet fun pool basketball set good for groups.
pros: The low cost makes this a customer favorite, with users remarking on the excellent value
It's great for groups of kids or teens
We love that it's simple but also offers plenty of fun
cons: Some experienced the ball or floater leaking air

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool parties, but buy some higher quality basketballs to use with it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, but great for pool parties. As others mentioned, the ball that comes with it is more like a small cheap beach ball. So you should get a couple or more better quality basketballs like the "Kids Replacement Basketball, Stylife Indoor Mini Hoop Ball - 5 inch diameter". We got the blue and red (more pinkish). Those are higher quality that you can use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy... I'm impressed. Lol.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has seriously been a trooper... Lol. I have had it for several months... with 2 small children and numerous playfriends. In and Out of the pool... Left out in the rain... And it is still kicking it. Pretty impressive. As a mom, I value sturdy pool toys and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: the ball that it comes with is not very good so I bought other ones
customer_reviews.text: Little one loves it, the ball that it comes with is not very good so I bought other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had one of these previously that we LOVED and used all the time
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these previously that we LOVED and used all the time, until it eventually needed replaced. My son bought another with his own money, but as soon as we pumped it up, it began loosing air. No hole or puncture, but appears to be a defect where it seals along vertical part. Unfortunately wasn't able to play with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dale

customer_reviews.title: Grown ups loving it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love it. We play with it every time we get in the pool. It's a fun way to get a little exercise and it's just plain fun. Kids would love it and we can't wait for the grandkids to come over and play with us. Like others, we use a different ball for games but even the cheap blow up ball can be fun, trying to make impossible baskets with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Banchero

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with my new swimming pool. The kids have had a blast with this thing. It holds air well also- no leaks. We used a small air pump to inflate it. I had read in the reviews that the ball that comes with this doesn't work well with the ball goal. I already had some plastic basket balls we were planning to use but we haven't needed them. The ball that came with this set works fine. You just need to be sure you pull the net all the way out when you set up it for the 1st time and there shouldn't be any issues with the ball going in the net.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Hallo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son and his friends to use in the pool. It was everything I expected. It stays inflated, and has been smooshed quite a few times from slam dunks. It was one of the few toys we bought this year that didn't break. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: This is a great alternative for him to play some b-ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew. I wanted to gift this to him so he can use it inside the house and during the summer. He loves playing basketball but it's too cold to be outside during the winter. This is a great alternative for him to play some b-ball. It is easy to inflate and just takes a couple of seconds. I've had no problem with the float staying up. I would definitely recomend it because it's a good value and it's a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for your buck!  Awesome pool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool toy! We ordered the Microfire ToddlerBalls to use because the included inflatable brown one was hard to throw into the hoop. We highly recommend the heavier balls for a real game. Easy to inflate. Fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: KeW12

customer_reviews.title: Ball has issues
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the ball has issues. Ours won't even close to hold air, but I knew the ball may have issues, so we're okay with that. We're just using a different ball. It's a fine hoop for the price. Just pretend it doesn't come with a ball and you'll be fine!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly kimzey

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for a nine-year-old boy for his birthday. He loves basketball and going to the pool, I thought why not get something that does both! We haven't taken it to the pool yet, but we played with it at his house and he absolutely loves it! It seems like it's a good quality and fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good fun
customer_reviews.text: Great Product the ball is a bit naff, wish it wasnt an inflatable ball but otherwise great As an Amazonaholic, I rely heavily on reviews from other users so I aim to contribute helpful reviews myself. Please let me know if you found my review helpful and feel free to comment if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Z9z9z9

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price and what you need it for, it’s perfect. I have a compressor so blowing it up was no problem. It handled the pool action well. The ball...that’s a joke. I used my kids many type of balls with it and it worked just fine. The ball it comes with is like a mini beach ball that serves no purpose really.
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My grandsons (8 and 6) have not killed it yet in their pool after two weeks and it has endured some abuse. The little guy likes to crawl inside it or wear it over himself and jump into the pool though we tell him it's not made for such purpose and isn't safe to do.
customer_reviews.author: CBaz

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, but not quite there
customer_reviews.text: Basketball goal is self is quite big, but the ball is a very light weight smaller than a Beachball toy. We will probably use a different type of ball next year with the goal. Goal seems to hold air quite nicely, but the ball, not so much It did arrive quickly and was well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Mimi1964

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little hoop!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this every day for about a week & I'm really glad I got it, it's a fun, affordable addition to our pool. I don't trust the ball that came with it to hold up for very long, luckily I took the advice of several reviews on here & ordered different balls.
customer_reviews.author: Beedledee

customer_reviews.title: ... exactly what I thought it would be and I love it; It is an inexpensive addition to the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I thought it would be and I love it; It is an inexpensive addition to the pool that will keep my kids busy for hours. It only took about a minute to blow up the hoop and it holds the air well which is nice because some products like this tend to leak slowly. If I had any complaint, the hoop could be a little bigger, but overall I am incredibly happy with this hoop and would absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: athares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the pool. Was worried it would be too small but for my 7 and 9 year old its great. Definitely need to buy a different ball to play with though. This is easy to inflate if you have a small air compressor. I can't imagine blowing this up by mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: kids toy not suitable for adult play
customer_reviews.text: the net is plastic and won't assume the correct position for the ball to be able to fall through and the ball is so light weight you can't shoot it from any distance. might be fun for little kids but don't waste your money if buying for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Land of Amy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this basketball hoop for my kids ( ages 8 and 12) to play with in the pool. It provided the fun and entertainment that I expected and we have been pleased with this purchase. After use we let the air out and put it in the basement and have not had any problems with it inflating again. So would buy again
customer_reviews.author: nobisfullhouse

customer_reviews.title: Shaq like this!
customer_reviews.text: Ever want to know how shaq felt the first few years in the NBA? This product will show you! I've been dunking on my small children and their friends all afternoon, its great to show them what it feels like to lose. No, you dont have to get them participation medals to stop them from crying. Just keep dunking and they seem to leave the pool pretty quickly. If only it could be improved by helping with my free throws.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than expected (TWSS). The ball that comes with it is also an inflatable toy like a floaty, so you may want to buy something with a little more weight to it. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight K. Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Fun.  Quality OK.  Ball not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Kids love it. Ball is blow up and too light...causing many misses. We will use a small rubber ball instead.The "net" is plastic sheeting with holes punched in it. They also use it as a floater. It is sturdy enough to stand a little rough housing from my wild grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: I expected more interest from the kids...
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected however the ball is too light weight to be very accurate. Use your own mini basketball or regular floating ball. Kids like it but used it to play other games and as a floaty.
customer_reviews.author: CR in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Like any blow up item like this
customer_reviews.text: Product does what its intended for. Like any blow up item like this, its far from symmetrical, but its good enough to play with. The ball is very lite so its hard to shoot any long shots as the wind resistance makes the ball fall short every time. Despite this, its still a safe and fun ball game for the kids in the pool. I'd recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: richc007

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, Just right for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in small, easy to store/carry box which makes it good for travel. It also has the ability to give hours of fun, alone or with family/friends. It inflates like your typical summer floatation devices so if you want to take it on a family vacation and then take it back home you can, just deflate and fold it back up. Under ten bucks with shipping so the value to cost ratio is also good.
customer_reviews.author: NRohner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product holding up to a 6yr old and 3 young teens. They all have a good time trying to slam dunk the ball thru the hoop. So far all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Schinhofen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing with this in the pool. I gave it four stars for two reasons: 1) The ball is not really usable - blows away in the wind. 2) The top portion didn't inflate as well as the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value pool toy !
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it in the pool... it doubles as a floaty for them as well so it's getting lots of use in the pool (more so than the inflatable donuts) and they love throwing balls at it... Only little problem for us is that the inflatable ball that came with it is super light, so tends to fly whereever it wants once thrown... luckily we have other balls that are small enough to go through the hoop anyway. Great value pool toy !
customer_reviews.author: Jon&RachTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: For 8 years+
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old was playing with this and got herself caught, thankfully I was paying close attention or she could of drown. I was happy to see the suggested ages it’s says 8 and up. Def don’t buy for younger kids!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Still works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these just in case my kids popped one, they never popped it. I instead gave the other one to family. These still work great, lost the ball but works with others.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and a lot of fun. The ball that comes with it isn't great but you can always get a different one. We use 2 different balls a volley ball and a smaller plastic ball.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap basketball hoop for pool, worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works good, the wind has a habit of picking it up and blowing it out of the pool though. I would also replace the inflatable ball that comes with it with something that has a little more weight to prevent the wind from blowing it all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: The hoop is great....the ball not so much
customer_reviews.text: The blow up hoop is fun and priced reasonably but the ball is a waste. It is cheap and too light weight to have any chance at throwing accurately. The review recommending you order the blue rubber ball is right on. I did that and it makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Ball needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun pool hoop. The ball it comes with is a joke though. It is so light that you have to be really close to the hoop to make a shot otherwise a slight breeze will blow it away. We happened to have 4 rubber basketballs the same size as the ball it came with and that is what made it fun. The boys (and dads) played with it for a good while. I highly suggest purchasing a couple more balls in order to make this useable.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Buy different balls
customer_reviews.text: The ball that comes with it is a joke but luckily I had purchased better replacement balls that are better. The kids loved playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: simple straight forward toy
customer_reviews.text: PAID $8.89 simple and fun toy - easy to inflate manually by adult. haven't used outside in pool yet - but my kids enjoyed playing with it inside in the living room. low cost toy with multiple uses (water or dry toy)
customer_reviews.author: MN Pony

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my very active, very athletic 6 year old grandson. He loved it and said he played with it a lot in his family's pool.
customer_reviews.author: singerjewel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and doubles as a good floatey
customer_reviews.text: The ball can easily get swept away by the slightest breeze but other than that everything is sturdy--inflates well with a pump and holds for many days. We fold it down for my 4 year old and she sometimes just uses it as a floatey in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Erika V.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy this!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and someone said to buy additional balls for it. Yes, you need to. The one it comes with is small and you can’t throw it far. My two year old popped a hole in this basketball hoop as soon as we blew it up. The patch works well and it’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Better for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I just received a defective one but it has a slow leak and deflated the first night. I wouldn’t recommend this for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: Great pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for pool toys for my teen boys, that were not expensive, that they'd like, use, that would stand up to their rough house playing & portable bc we don't have private pool at home, this was perfect! We use this at a lake, at home community pool & country club pool, bc of the size it doesn't get in others way, (so no complaints), other kids have happily joined in & it keeps them entertained, post phoning how long till I hear that annoying "I'm bored". Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool game, granddaughters like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughters when they come over to swim in my pool. I only gave it 4 stars because, well, it should come with like 5 balls LOL. You have to keep swimming over to the basket to retrieve the ball (or have someone stand at the basket to toss the ball back to the players). It's fun, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. I wish it was weighted down a little in the bottom because it turns over pretty easily or will come out of the water if its too windy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this inflatable hoop and ball. For the price, you can not beat it. Good quality. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because the kids wanted to play more in the pool so this was added to the collection and its a hit. I thought at first it was a cheap toy when we got it but its actually pretty solid. Having 5 kids jump on it and all that is playing no problems and I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: KMU

customer_reviews.title: Good hoop for pool
customer_reviews.text: Cute hoop and ball. Kids love playing with it in the pool. Had for about a month and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Young Ones
customer_reviews.text: This floating basketball hoop adds an extra dimension of fun to the summer and poolside activities. I purchased this set for my four year old son and his cousins. It was well received. It does not take long to blow up and stands up quite well. I do recommend care being used around this inflatable, as with any other. This was a big hit at the beach and at home in the pool. It can also be fun out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Kalistah

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandkids. It wasn’t what I thought it would be. The grandkids did not like playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zazycourage

customer_reviews.title: Use a different ball
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t inflate straight. Kind of wonky looking. Still useable. Wish the ball was a heavier ball. We use a small basketball instead.
customer_reviews.author: ThisAndThat

customer_reviews.title: Instant fun
customer_reviews.text: Instant fun for a little one. It will be great for the pool, but we use it for a 2 year old inside that provides enough fun and entertainment for him.
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: It's been a perfect toy for both of them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my son could play basketball in the bathtub and my husband could play basketball in the big pool! It's been a perfect toy for both of them! It's so easy to inflate (especially with an inpatient toddler chomping at the bits to play!) We've all had a blast in the pool taking turns dunking the ball and hitting fade away jump shots! The base and hoop have taken many hits as we have all landed on them many times so it is very durable. This is a great way to provide hours of fun to all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not that durable!
customer_reviews.text: Okay but was hard to blow up! The ball popped right off! You need to be able to anchor the floating basket to actually shoot hoops or play a game!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Richter

customer_reviews.title: kind of flimsy
customer_reviews.text: used for my 4th of July party, kind of flimsy but it held the air
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the pool this summer..... lots of crazy games.....
customer_reviews.author: joyce trice

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The hoop is on the smaller side (small, light basketball),but good for kids to play with. Probably not so great for adults.
customer_reviews.author: yankee14

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love to play this in the pool. It also helps them learn to make baskets in basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked this thing survived two grown adults having a dunk contest for over 2 hours in the pool. This toy is so much fun and durable, just get one because you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for I guess!!
customer_reviews.text: It inflates, but was hard to get a firm inflation it. Same with the ball. It was very easy to topple while shooting ball at it. But fun all the same!!
customer_reviews.author: Winky Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great pool fun.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Not too small. Just needs some sort of anchor or something so it stays near the middle of the pool though. The ball works fine for us and has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: No ball just basket
customer_reviews.text: This arrived without the ball. The basket is fine, but I was disappointed that the ball wasn't with it. My kids were so excited to play with it,but it is pretty useless without a ball.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping the kids would like this.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s just another one of those pool toys that ends up sitting on the deck or worn on someone’s head. No problem with the product not being what i had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st place
customer_reviews.text: I’m undefeated this season and took the championship will have to defend my title nest swim season
customer_reviews.author: Superman

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t hold air. After blowing it up everyday I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t hold air. After blowing it up everyday I noticed that there was 2 holes in the bottom ring that had been patched before we even got it. 2 thumbs down. Wish I would have noticed sooner. I would have tried to return it .
customer_reviews.author: Hjbaby

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect for my above ground pool
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for my above ground pool. Basketball is a little small, but perfect for my 5 year old grandson who could hold it and try to dunk with it which got him going underwater and getting face wet with out being scared. My 9 year old did awesome dunks over and over. Got my moneys worth in the first couple of days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a gift for a friends child, they love it
customer_reviews.author: holly holman

customer_reviews.title: Glad we took an air pump
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a lake trip and though it didn't get used as much as I thought it would, for the price it was worth it. Glad we took an air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for for the kids in the pool
customer_reviews.text: For pool time my kids loved it and made through first season
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: fair for the price
customer_reviews.text: would be nice if the item was weighted or had extended weighted sinkers to not allow the basket to move so easily. would be nice to have a few balls rather than just one
customer_reviews.author: Partial order

customer_reviews.title: Fun pool toy
customer_reviews.text: Ours was missing the basketball but, as usual, Amazon's awesome customer service came through. The kids love it and play with it often. Prefer this to the pvc/styrofoam varieties b/c it's soft but durable. The kids have used and abused this and bounces it right back. Also with no hard pieces there's no need to worry about delicate pool liners.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ott

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have so much fun playing with this cheap little toy in our pool. You can even turn it upside down for a bigger hole/game variation. We used a heavier ball but definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: melrosiest

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He uses it in the pool. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: We use this in a little bitty pool. My ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a little bitty pool. My 5 year old nephew likes it, but my husband likes it more. The top becomes a little deflated after some use because it doesn't have it's own blow up portion. I think that if the top had it's own blow up portion then I could give it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Love4Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great pool toy for 8 year granddaughters. Good price. Not heavy duty but will last a couple of summers.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe In Tx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the older children who attended and the adults ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's first birthday party in August. Used it in a blow up pool. Perfect for the older children who attended and the adults had fun with it too. I bought extra blow up beach balls to throw at it
customer_reviews.author: Ben Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Lasts longer than anticipated! Certainly a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Short

customer_reviews.title: Kids however seemed to like them; but the ball didn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: Right after I received these I went to five below and found them there. Could have bought two for the price of one here. Just a friendly FYI. Kids however seemed to like them; but the ball didn't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: kay11mae

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: We had a good time with this over the summer. All adults so no child rough housing with it. Great for free throws and dunking. Take it inside on real windy days or storms because like any float, it won't stay in the pool and you could lose the basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Item had a slow leak and would not stay fully inflated upon unboxing. This seems to be made out of flimsy material and is not durable like other inflatable pool floaters. It’s a shame because it’s a really cute idea - I wish this had worked for us, but unfortunately it was cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Vielavesta

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold up very well at all. Not with the money.
customer_reviews.author: jwhitney

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this in the pool
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. It works great, and was easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Cute.. VERY BIG!
customer_reviews.text: It’s giant.. Even for an adult.. looks just like pic tho. Just too big for pool fun unless you are diving through the hole.. It’s a novelty gift..
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: Nice temporary entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Kids had fun with it but became bored with it after about 4 days of play.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Jenzen

customer_reviews.title: We like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: We put this in teh pool immediately. We like it a lot. We dont really use the inflatable ball that came with it though, its way too flimsy. We hae another ball from a mini hop set for in the house we use and its a fun time for all.
customer_reviews.author: vtoria98

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it but I think it’s too big for what I wanted and that’s for my hot tub that would work great for a pool
customer_reviews.author: Debi Jenderseck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blow up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blow up. Kids love it, Only problem the ball needs to be something different, hard to throw with air. and after a few hours of playing with it, the ball deflated and is garbage, we're okay with that. We're just using a different ball. the basket Stays upright. Seems to be very sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Random user

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Pool Game
customer_reviews.text: Although it says colors may vary, I received the actual color shown and was very happy with the product. Super easy to blow up, doesn't loose any air even after a pounding by teenagers. It is on the small side, but still does the job and great pool fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Gesell

customer_reviews.title: Basketball
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable. I expected it to be smaller I’m very happy with this purchase I can’t wait for my grandchildren to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hours of pool fun. Sturdy. Held up well to the teenager jumping on it and slam dunking
customer_reviews.author: ClubofLimas

customer_reviews.title: Good hoop
customer_reviews.text: Blows up easy and a good size but the top doesn’t blow up all the way. It stays flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: DRaft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this for the kids game portion of our family reunion. no complains, works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 hat
customer_reviews.text: Good, durable toy. Bought it for an 11-year-old's birthday party with about ten kids in that age range and maybe two of them used it as intended. Most enjoyed using the base like a regular pool float, the hoop acting as a hat. Kids had fun with it...that's about all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Super fun basketball hoop!!!! Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This basketball game is awesome for the pool and my nieces and nephews love it!!! Would have given this a 5 star but the basketball that comes with the floating hoop is too light and you have to throw it somewhat hard and the ball tends to fly away sometimes. We added a little bit of water inside the little basketball to make it heavier and it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Pg

customer_reviews.title: This is a relatively fun game, except the hoops is so small that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a relatively fun game, except the hoops is so small that it's difficult for kids and adults to score points, which makes it a little less fun. Also deflates pretty quickly. But that's as to be expected given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Fun new pool toy.
customer_reviews.text: Inflated easily, fun to play with in the pool. I kind of wish the ball was just a tiny bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Curious One

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Inflate, Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item quickly and with no issues. It is easy to use - just blow up and go! It looks just like the pictures. Great summer game for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: natalie ellis

customer_reviews.title: Buy a ball separately.
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is great it's dirty and makes for a good time at the pool. The ball is garbage. It is so light it gets caught in the slightest breeze. I would recommend buying a ball separately but other than that the actual main part of this hoop set is great.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pool fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and size. After reading other reviews, I also purchased a SKLZ Pro Mini Hoop Ball which has more weight and works better than the ball that's included but I bought this for the hoop and didn't mind the additional expense. You could certainly play with the ball that comes with it, but we prefer the heavier one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable hoop is small, well constructed, and fits perfectly in any pool. It is not going to take up space in above ground pools. But as always when in the pool be careful and watchful of your kids, mine ended up wanting to use it like a donut and that can be dangerous especially if they have floaters to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Ordered for a younger child so needed a smaller, easier version and this delivers. Doesn't look like it will last years and years but perfect for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn
